scripts.postinstall: yarn run update:android && yarn run update:ios && yarn run update:lib && yarn run update:package
scripts.update:android: yarn rimraf node_modules/react-native-track-player/android && yarn cpx '../android/**' node_modules/react-native-track-player/android && yarn rimraf node_modules/react-native-track-player/android/build
scripts.update:ios: yarn rimraf node_modules/react-native-track-player/ios && yarn cpx '../ios/**' node_modules/react-native-track-player/ios && yarn rimraf node_modules/react-native-track-player/ios/generated
scripts.clean:gradle: cd android && rm -Rf .gradle && rm -Rf app/build && ./gradlew clean
